author: jsor@businessinsider.com (Jennifer Sor)
title: Bitcoin needs to clear this key technical resistance level to open the door to a 25% rally, strategist says
description: Bitcoin is getting a boost from a handful of catalysts that could take its price as high as $143,000, Rosenberg Research said.
content:
Bitcoin jumping above a key technical threshold would open a path to a much larger rally ahead, according to a market strategist. 
In a note to clients last week, Ed Campbell of Rosenberg Research s… [+3424 chars]
